comment.body: @Flyman: Probably you perceive it as bold because you are used to this font with much smaller font size. Just open some editor (Word, WordPad, etc), copypaste your text, set font to Lucida Console and then play with size comparing the result with website side by side.
Seconding this stuff. Even if all these 4 computers left zeronet, your is still here, so it should be there, right?
